
```{r key-period-dispatch-zone-{{period.name}}-{{zone.name}}, results='asis', include=TRUE}
p.name = '{{period.name}}' # Assign key period name
z.name = '{{zone.name}}' # Assign zone name
cat("### ", p.name, ': ', z.name) # Print key period and zone name above plot
text.plot=11
figure.width = 9
figure.height = 6
```

```{r key-period-dispatch-plots-zone-{{period.name}}-{{zone.name}}, fig.width=figure.width, fig.height=figure.height, include=TRUE}
  
stack.data = gen.type.zone[Period==p.name & Zone==z.name, ]
# Make plot if data exists for this zone
if (length(stack.data[, value])>0 & sum(stack.data[, value])>0 ) {
  p1 = dispatch_plot(stack.data, gen.load.zone[Period==p.name & Zone==z.name, ])
  print(p1)
} else { print('No generation found for this period and zone.')}

```
